data.text: @CorbetJanie @JohnFernandez1 @steve_falla It does eh….but, I can still remember I was having lunch in the Rockmount when it popped up on the news….having just bought a travel voucher as a raffle prize 🤣
@JohnFernandez1 A fitting day for me to return my first ever positive LFT!

@ElevenGg @JohnFernandez1 I think it's unrealistic to expect to contain Covid to such an extent that only a minor number of cases is seen in the community. Herd immunity is likely, whether this was always the aim I couldn't say. Another booster in Autumn and then I'd probably expect an annual one.
@JohnFernandez1 And we are now a a rapid trajectory upwards. Everyone I have come across knows someone or has had covid. Is this the new norm? Herd immunity?
